allow:
Bash(echo "To check PM2 logs on your production server, run these commands:

# View full logs for notification service
pm2 logs notification-service --lines 200

# Or view just the output logs \(not errors\)
pm2 logs notification-service --out --lines 200

# Search for relance enrollment in logs
pm2 logs notification-service --lines 500 | grep -i ''relance enrollment''

# View logs from a specific time \(if using pm2-logrotate\)
cat ~/.pm2/logs/notification-service-out.log | grep -i ''relance''

# Or tail the log file directly
tail -500 ~/.pm2/logs/notification-service-out.log | grep -i ''enrollment''
")
